messenger.name: Messenger Traversing Hackerspace
messenger.desc4: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, SPD for all allies increases by 12% for 1 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

disiciple.name: Longevous Disciple
disiciple.desc4: When the wearer is hit or has their HP consumed by an ally or themselves, their CRIT Rate increases by 8% for 2 turn(s) and up to 2 stacks.

pioneer.name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
pioneer.desc2: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuff by 12%.
pioneer.desc4: Increases CRIT Rate by 4%. The wearer deals 8%/12% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least 2/3 debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by 100%, lasting for 1 turn.

watchmaker.name: Watchmaker, Master of Dream Machinations
watchmaker.desc4: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, all allies' Break Effect increases by 30% for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

duke.name: The Ashblazing Grand Duke
duke.desc4: When the wearer uses follow-up attacks against the target enemy, increase the wearer's ATK by 6% for every time the follow-up attack deals DMG. This effect can stack for a maximum of 8 times and lasts for 3 turns. This effect is removed the next time the wearer uses a follow-up attack.

prisoner.name: Prisoner in Deep Confinement
prisoner.desc4: For every DoT the target enemy is afflicted with, the wearer will ignore 6% of target's DEF when dealing DMG to them. This effect is valid for a max of 3 DoTs.

musketeer.name: Musketeer of Wild Wheat
musketeer.desc4: The wearer's SPD increases by 6% and Basic ATK DMG increases by 10%.

passerby.name: Passerby of Wandering Cloud
passerby.desc4: At the beginning of the battle, immediately recovers 1 Skill Point.

eagle.name: Eagle of Twilight Line
eagle.desc4: After the wearer uses Ultimate, their action is Advanced Forward by 25%.

knight.name: Knight of Purity Palace
knight.desc4: Increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the shield created by the wearer by 20%.

iron.name: Iron Cavalry Against the Scourge
iron.desc4: If the wearer's Break Effect is 150% or higher, the Break DMG dealt to the enemy target ignores 10% of their DEF. If the wearer's Break Effect is 250% or higher, the Super Break DMG dealt to the enemy target additionally ignores 15% of their DEF.

soaring.name: The Wind-Soaring Valorous
soaring.desc4: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 6%. When the wearer uses a follow-up attack, increases the DMG dealt by Ultimate by 36%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

scholar.name: Scholar Lost in Erudition
scholar.desc4: Increases DMG dealt by Ultimate and Skill by 20%. After using Ultimate, additionally increases the DMG dealt by the next Skill by 25%.

sacred.name: Sacerdos' Relived Ordeal
sacred.desc4: When using Skill or Ultimate on one ally target, increases the ability target's CRIT DMG by 18%, lasting for 2 turns. This effect can stack up to 2 times.

fleet.name: Fleet of the Ageless
fleet.desc2: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, all allies' ATK increases by 8%.

space.name: Space Sealing Station
space.desc2: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's ATK increases by an extra 12%.

sprightly.name: Sprightly Vonwacq
sprightly.desc2: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's action is Advanced Forward by 40% immediately upon entering battle.

talia.name: Talia: Kingdom of Banditry
talia.desc2: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 145 or higher, the wearer's Break Effect increases by an extra 20%.

salsotto.name: Inert Salsotto
salsotto.desc2: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 50% or higher, the wearer's Ultimate and follow-up attack DMG increases by 15%.

belobog.name: Belobog of the Architects
belobog.desc2: Increases the wearer's DEF by 15%. When the wearer's Effect Hit Rate is 50% or higher, the wearer gains an extra 15% DEF.

arena.name: Rutiliant Arena
arena.desc2: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 70% or higher, the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill DMG increase by 20%.

keel.name: Broken Keel
keel.desc2: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by 10%. When the wearer's Effect RES is at 30% or higher, all allies' CRIT DMG increases by 10%.

firmament.name: Firmament Frontline: Glamoth
firmament.desc2: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD is equal to or higher than 135/160, the wearer deals 12%/18% more DMG.

penacony.name: Penacony, Land of the Dreams
penacony.desc2: Increases wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. Increases DMG by 10% for all other allies that are of the same Type as the wearer.

duran.name: Duran, Dynasty of Running Wolves
duran.desc2: When an ally uses follow-up attacks, the wearer gains 1 stack of Merit, stacking up to 5 time(s). Each stack of Merit increases the DMG dealt by the wearer's follow-up attacks by 5%. When there are 5 stacks, additionally increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 25%.

lamp.name: Forge of the Kalpagni Lantern
lamp.desc2: Increases the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer hits an enemy target that has Fire Weakness, the wearer's Break Effect increases by 40%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

banana.name: The Wondrous BananAmusement Park
banana.desc2: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 16%. When a target summoned by the wearer is on the field, CRIT DMG additionally increases by 32%.

lushaka.name: Lushaka, the Sunken Seas
lushaka.desc2: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. If the wearer is not the first character in the team lineup, then increases the ATK of the first character in the team lineup by 12%.
